description: Views information about a specific execution of a specific association.

parameters.name: AssociationId
parameters.description: The association ID that includes the execution for which you want to view details.

parameters.name: ExecutionId
parameters.description: The execution ID for which you want to view details.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters for the request. You can specify the following filters and values. Status (EQUAL) ResourceId (EQUAL) ResourceType (EQUAL) (dict) --- Filters for the association execution. The key value used in the request. The value specified for the key.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key value used in the request.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value specified for the key.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The resource ID, for example, the managed node ID where the association ran.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type, for example, EC2.

nested_items.name: DetailedStatus
nested_items.description: Detailed information about the execution status.

nested_items.name: LastExecutionDate
nested_items.description: The date of the last execution.

nested_items.name: OutputSource
nested_items.description: The location where the association details are saved.

nested_items.name: OutputSourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the output source, for example the URL of an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: OutputSourceType
nested_items.description: The type of source where the association execution details are stored, for example, Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
